LightswordGlowing.name: Lightsword (Pre-Transformation)
LightswordGlowing.full_description: A glowing, indeterminate humanoid figure wrapped in soft golden-white light. No defined species yet - ethereal and mysterious. Wearing simple ceremonial robes over the glowing form. Eyes are bright points of warm light. The light pulses gently with emotions.

description_components.head_face: Indeterminate glowing form, no defined features yet, face is soft golden-white light with brighter points where eyes would be, warm and kind expression visible through the glow
description_components.body_build: Humanoid shape made of soft golden-white light, lean and young, no defined species characteristics yet, light streams and flows gently
description_components.armor_clothing: Simple cream-colored ceremonial robes worn over the glowing form, hood down, the glow shines through the fabric softly
description_components.accessories: Deck of Aspect Cards (red green blue gold glowing cards) tucked in belt pouch, no other items yet

LightswordLizardfolk.name: Lightsword (Post-Transformation)
LightswordLizardfolk.full_description: A Lizardfolk with green-brown scales that shimmer with draconic heritage. Lean, athletic build. Golden-amber eyes with vertical pupils. Small horn-like ridges along the brow. Scales occasionally shimmer with magical energy. Confident but kind expression. Can manifest a blade of pure light from his palm.

description_components.head_face: Lizardfolk head with green-brown scales, golden-amber eyes with vertical dragon-like pupils, small horn ridges along brow, kind intelligent expression, scales shimmer with inner magic
description_components.body_build: Lean athletic Lizardfolk build, green-brown scales covering entire body, young and capable, draconic heritage visible in scale patterns
description_components.armor_clothing: Simple adventurer's clothing suitable for cave dwelling - leather vest, cloth pants, bare scaled feet, practical and unadorned
description_components.accessories: Deck of Aspect Cards in belt pouch, can manifest a blade of pure golden light from palm when needed, scales glow faintly when using magic

Spore.name: Spore the Myconid
Spore.full_description: A small mushroom creature about knee-height. Pale cap with bioluminescent spots that glow soft blue. Big, expressive dark eyes. Releases colored spores based on emotion - gray when scared or sad, rainbow when joyful. Lightsword's best friend from the underground village.

description_components.head_face: Mushroom cap head - pale cream color with bioluminescent blue-glowing spots, large expressive dark eyes like pools of night, small mouth that can smile or frown
description_components.body_build: Small stubby myconid body knee-height to a humanoid, pale cream-colored stem body, short stubby arms and legs, spongy and soft looking
description_components.armor_clothing: No clothing - natural myconid form, possibly tiny accessories like a friendship bracelet or small pouch
description_components.accessories: Releases spores based on emotion (gray sad spores, rainbow joyful spores, blue curious spores), carries small treasures from underground home

SporeCaptive.name: Spore (Captured by Shadow Sorcerer)
SporeCaptive.full_description: Spore bound to the altar by chains of shadow in the corrupted Temple sanctum. Releasing scared gray spores. Big eyes wide with fear but lighting up with hope when Lightsword arrives. Struggling weakly against the dark chains.

description_components.head_face: Same mushroom cap head, bioluminescent spots dimmed by fear, eyes enormous with terror and hope, small mouth trembling
description_components.body_build: Same small myconid body now bound and restrained, trembling with fear, gray spores puffing out involuntarily
description_components.armor_clothing: No clothing, body pressed against cold stone altar
description_components.accessories: Shadow chains wrapped around body pinning to altar, gray fear spores releasing constantly, reaching tiny arms toward Lightsword when seen

Darkstorm.name: Darkstorm the Dire Wolf
Darkstorm.full_description: An enormous wolf the size of a horse, with thick silver-grey fur. Once cursed and in pain, now healed and loyal. Intelligent amber eyes show gratitude and devotion. Follows at respectful distance, ready to protect. Named Darkstorm after being freed from shadow chains.

description_components.head_face: Massive wolf head with intelligent amber eyes, thick fur around neck like mane, ears alert, expression of loyalty and gratitude
description_components.body_build: Enormous wolf size of a horse, powerful shoulders and haunches, thick silver-grey fur, healthy and strong after healing
description_components.armor_clothing: Natural thick grey fur, no collar or harness, wild but allied
description_components.accessories: Faint scar on front leg where curse once bound it, no other markings, moves with pack-hunter grace, can be enchanted to fly temporarily

TheElder.name: The Elder of Aspects
TheElder.full_description: An ancient and ageless figure who conducts the Choosing ceremony. Dressed in shimmering robes that shift between red, green, blue, and gold. Wise eyes that have seen countless heroes rise. Voice like warm thunder - powerful but kind.

description_components.head_face: Ageless androgynous face, neither young nor old, wise knowing eyes that shift color subtly, long silver-white hair flowing freely, serene expression of ancient wisdom
description_components.body_build: Tall and graceful, neither frail nor imposing, moves with supernatural smoothness, age indeterminate
description_components.armor_clothing: Flowing ceremonial robes that shimmer and shift between red green blue and gold, embroidered with Aspect symbols, barefoot on sacred ground
description_components.accessories: Simple circlet of intertwined metals (iron silver copper gold) representing the four Aspects, no staff or weapon, hands often raised in blessing

ElderWeakened.name: The Elder (Weakened by Shadow)
ElderWeakened.full_description: The Elder after the Temple has been corrupted by shadow magic. Still dignified but visibly weakened, robes dimmed, struggling to stand. Pleads with the hero to save the beloved NPC and stop the Specter.

description_components.head_face: Same ageless face now drawn with strain, eyes flickering weakly between colors, silver hair disheveled, expression of desperate hope
description_components.body_build: Same tall frame now hunched and weakened, leaning against temple wall for support, trembling slightly
description_components.armor_clothing: Ceremonial robes now dimmed and tattered at edges, colors muted and flickering, bare feet dirty from corrupted stone
description_components.accessories: Circlet still worn but glowing weakly, one hand clutching chest, other reaching toward hero

GarrettMerchant.name: Garrett the Traveling Merchant
GarrettMerchant.full_description: A jovial MEDIEVAL FANTASY traveling merchant with a full grey beard and kind eyes. Dressed in a colorful patchwork traveling cloak over simple medieval peasant clothes. Wears a floppy wide-brimmed hat. His wooden merchant wagon is painted with faded guild symbols. Grateful to be rescued from goblins.

description_components.head_face: Round friendly human face with rosy cheeks, full bushy grey beard, kind twinkling brown eyes, weathered skin from travel, wearing a floppy wide-brimmed cloth hat
description_components.body_build: Stocky middle-aged build, slight paunch from good living, strong arms from loading wagons, mid-50s
description_components.armor_clothing: Colorful patchwork traveling cloak with many sewn patches, simple cream tunic underneath, brown leather vest, rope belt with coin pouches, worn leather boots - MEDIEVAL FANTASY style
description_components.accessories: Wooden walking staff, leather satchel with brass buckles, merchant guild bronze medallion on leather cord

GarrettHiding.name: Garrett (Under Attack)
GarrettHiding.full_description: A jovial MEDIEVAL FANTASY traveling merchant cowering behind his wooden wagon as goblin arrows thud into the wood around him. Full grey beard, floppy wide-brimmed hat, colorful patchwork cloak. Terrified but calling for help.

description_components.head_face: Same weathered face now pale with fear, eyes wide and searching for help, beard disheveled, mouth open calling for aid
description_components.body_build: Same stocky frame now crouched low behind wagon wheel, making himself small
description_components.armor_clothing: Same traveling clothes now dusty and dirty, coat torn by near-miss arrow, one pocket ripped open
description_components.accessories: Hat fallen off nearby, satchel clutched protectively, one hand on horse's bridle trying to calm it

Starwind.name: Starwind the Pegasus
Starwind.full_description: A magnificent winged horse with a pure white coat and feathered wings spanning 20 feet. Noble and intelligent, with silver hooves and a flowing mane. Freed from shadow chains and eternally grateful, offering to carry the hero.

description_components.head_face: Noble equine head with intelligent expressive eyes, flowing silver-white mane, alert ears, ethereal beauty
description_components.body_build: Powerful athletic horse body, pure white coat that seems to glow faintly, muscular haunches for powerful flight
description_components.armor_clothing: No tack or saddle, natural wild freedom, coat pristine white with faint celestial shimmer
description_components.accessories: Massive feathered wings spanning 20 feet pure white, silver hooves that gleam, flowing tail like spun moonlight

StarwindCursed.name: Starwind (Bound by Shadow)
StarwindCursed.full_description: The same magnificent pegasus but trapped and suffering. Shadow chains bind her legs, her wings hang limp and grey, eyes full of pain. Dark energy crackles around her as shadows circle menacingly.

description_components.head_face: Same noble head now lowered in pain, eyes pleading for help, mane tangled and dimmed, sweat on brow
description_components.body_build: Same powerful body now trembling, legs buckling under weight of shadow chains, coat dulled from white to grey
description_components.armor_clothing: Chains of pure shadow wrapped around legs, dark energy crackling where chains touch, no celestial glow
description_components.accessories: Wings hanging limp at sides feathers turning grey, silver hooves dimmed to dull pewter, tail dragging on ground

Pip.name: Pip the Pseudodragon
Pip.full_description: A tiny dragon about the size of a rabbit, with warm reddish-brown scales and beautiful iridescent bat-like wings. Has a distinctly reptilian dragon head with large expressive amber eyes, small curved horns, and an elongated snout. Long serpentine neck and tail. Found injured in the maze, becomes a loyal companion when shown kindness. Communicates through emotion rather than words.

description_components.head_face: Small reptilian DRAGON head with large expressive amber eyes, tiny curved horns, elongated snout with small nostrils, intelligent curious expression
description_components.body_build: Tiny dragon body about the size of a rabbit, covered in warm reddish-brown scales, sinuous serpentine form with long graceful neck and tail
description_components.armor_clothing: Natural scales in warm reddish-brown tones with iridescent sheen catching light, no clothing
description_components.accessories: Bat-like wings folded or spread, long tail ending in small stinger, small clawed feet for perching on shoulders

PipInjured.name: Pip (Injured in Maze)
PipInjured.full_description: A tiny injured dragon (pseudodragon) about the size of a rabbit. Warm reddish-brown scales, reptilian dragon head with large frightened amber eyes, one bat-like wing bent at wrong angle. Curled up protectively in hidden alcove. Eyes huge with fear and hope when first seen.

description_components.head_face: Small reptilian dragon head with enormous frightened amber eyes, pressed low against ground, tiny whimper
description_components.body_build: Tiny dragon body about rabbit-sized, curled up defensively, one wing bent at painful angle, shivering slightly
description_components.armor_clothing: Same reddish-brown scales now dusty, some scales scuffed from injury, iridescence dimmed
description_components.accessories: One wing bent wrong trailing painfully, tail curled around body protectively, surrounded by small shiny treasures (coins broken crystal pretty stones)

DireWolfAlly.name: The Redeemed Dire Wolf
DireWolfAlly.full_description: An enormous wolf the size of a horse, with thick silver-grey fur. Once cursed and in pain, now healed and loyal. Intelligent pack-hunter eyes now show gratitude and devotion. Follows at respectful distance, ready to protect.

description_components.head_face: Massive wolf head with intelligent amber eyes, thick fur around neck like mane, ears alert, expression of loyalty and gratitude
description_components.body_build: Enormous wolf size of a horse, powerful shoulders and haunches, thick silver-grey fur, healthy and strong
description_components.armor_clothing: Natural thick grey fur, no collar or harness, wild but allied
description_components.accessories: Faint scar on front leg where curse once bound it, no other markings, moves with pack-hunter grace

HeroPlaceholder.name: [HERO NAME]
HeroPlaceholder.full_description: A young hero on the day of their Choosing, discovering their true potential. Appearance determined by the Player's choices. Carries the Aspect cards and faces trials with courage. By the end, their true class will be revealed.

description_components.head_face: [To be determined by the Player - age, race, features, expression]
description_components.body_build: [To be determined - young, athletic, appropriate for a new adventurer]
description_components.armor_clothing: [To be determined - starting outfit suitable for ceremony, may change during adventure]
description_components.accessories: [The Aspect Cards - deck of glowing cards in red green blue gold, plus any items gained during trials]

BelovedNPCPlaceholder.name: [BELOVED NPC NAME]
BelovedNPCPlaceholder.full_description: The person or creature the hero cares about most. Determined by the Player at the start of the adventure. Captured by the Specter and held in the Temple Sanctum. Their rescue is the final trial's emotional core.

description_components.head_face: [To be determined by the Player - could be parent, friend, sibling, mentor, or pet]
description_components.body_build: [To be determined based on who the Player chooses]
description_components.armor_clothing: [To be determined - appropriate for their role in hero's life]
description_components.accessories: [To be determined - something meaningful that connects them to the hero]

BelovedCaptured.name: [BELOVED NPC] (Captured)
BelovedCaptured.full_description: The beloved NPC bound to the altar by shadow chains, frightened but hopeful upon seeing the hero. The emotional stakes of the final confrontation. Their faith in the hero never wavers.

description_components.head_face: [Same as beloved NPC but showing fear, relief at seeing hero, faith in their rescue]
description_components.body_build: [Same but restrained, unable to move freely, straining toward hero]
description_components.armor_clothing: [Same but disheveled, possibly torn from struggle]
description_components.accessories: [Shadow chains binding them to altar, meaningful item still visible]
